name: Earlier than expected
description:
This is my first ever Live- Action Role playing Story based game made for Game Jam, hope you like it.

It contains real graphics and unique focused story-line in which a Guy wakes up and finds out that he is stuck in his own house.  Time looping concepts are used in this game

It is inspired by:

Sega CD classic games and....

Life is strange, Senua Hellblade, Live, die repeat, time looping concept in various movies
